name: post-movie musings
description:
This is my first game so pls go easy on me thank u

A short lil snapshot I made about the things I think about in the post-movie daze-y haze thingy that happens to me (and probably others too), with a dash of social anxiety on the side. Keep in mind that you're playing a memory of sorts that I have in my mind so tenses are weird and time is irrelevant (:

CONTROLS:

wasd keys to move;

walk into things to play the dialogue;

click any key to continue text.

Hope you enjoy! :)

P.S. There's a sprite in there that's tougher to find than others, it says something about falling and crashing cars I think? d:
